FuncDef: The display dns server command displays the configuration and sequence of the current DNS server. The display dns server command displays the configuration and sequence of the current DNS server.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a VPN instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters. The VPN instance name cannot be _public_. The character string can contain spaces if it is enclosed with double quotation marks (").

Displays detailed information about the DNS server.
-
